doc.title: 26000 gezichten
doc.plot: 26000 gezichten (26000 faces) is an initiative of a 100 Dutch Filmmakers, who question the expel of a huge group of long term staying asylum seekers in the Netherlands. The goal is to make personal cinematic portraits of this unfortunate group of people, for daily broadcasting on national TV. "Harry" tells the story of Abdikarim. After war, fear and captivity, this Somalian young man, now has to leave again, from Holland...

26000 gezichten (26000 faces) is an initiative of a 100 Dutch Filmmakers, who question the expel of a huge group of long term staying asylum seekers in the Netherlands. The goal is to make personal cinematic portraits of this unfortunate group of people, for daily broadcasting on national TV. "Harry" tells the story of Abdikarim. After war, fear and captivity, this Somalian young man, now has to leave again, from Holland...
